Method.name: bindHotkeys
parameters: * hotkeys - A table containing hotkey modifier/key details for the following items:
* space_left - This will move the front most window to the space to the left of the current one
* space_right - This will move the front most window to the space to the right of the current one

desc: Move front most window to the space to the right or left
doc: Much of the code was written by Szymon Kaliski ([hi@szymonkaliski.com](hi@szymonkaliski.com)), converted to spoon by Tyler Thrailkill ([tyler.b.thrailkill@gmail.com](tyler.b.thrailkill@gmail.com), [https://github.com/snowe2010](https://github.com/snowe2010)).
Make sure you have [the undocumented spaces module](https://github.com/asmagill/hs._asm.undocumented.spaces/releases) present under `~/.hammerspoon/hs/_asm/undocumented/spaces`
name: MoveSpaces
stripped_doc: Much of the code was written by Szymon Kaliski ([hi@szymonkaliski.com](hi@szymonkaliski.com)), converted to spoon by Tyler Thrailkill ([tyler.b.thrailkill@gmail.com](tyler.b.thrailkill@gmail.com), [https://github.com/snowe2010](https://github.com/snowe2010)).
